text: Yves Durand (14 April 1932 – April 2004) was a French historian, professor of modern history at the Sorbonne. He was a member of the Club de l'horloge.http://reflexes.samizdat.net/quand-lextreme-droite-se-met-en- culture-suite/. ==References== Category:Carrefour de l'horloge people Category:1932 births Category:2004 deaths Category:University of Paris faculty Category:20th-century French historians Category:Knights of the National Order of Merit (France) Category:Officiers of the Légion d'honneur Category:Winners of the Prix Broquette-Gonin (literature)
title: Yves Durand (academic)
